channel.title: Gangwon-do on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: A fragrance filled with tears, Goseong Honey Lavender Farm - Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
One day it rained

A fragrance filled with tears, Goseong Honey Lavender Farm

Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

Your figure came softly like purple ~ ♪

Why did you sway 'You who came gently' to 'Purple'? When I was heading for Goseong Lavender Farm, I suddenly came across the lyrics of 'purple scent'. The thought that I've never had in my life has passed on this road, perhaps because my curiosity and anticipation about the purple world I'll meet soon dominated my mind.

Shinni Lavender Farm, a new world met in Goseong
The road to Goseong is long and rough. When you depart from Seoul, you must travel through Inje and Jinbu-ryeong for about 3 hours. Inje is the 38th border area that created "When and when you go to Inje," and Jinbu-ryeong is the stem of the Taebaek Mountains connecting Inje and Goseong. Novice drivers are even more reluctant because there are many winding roads. Nevertheless, there is a reason to head to Goseong. This is because it is now time for the lavenders of Hanni Lavender Farm to burst into purple flowers and create spectacular views. Lavender is a thankful thing to offer new sights in this poor season, where there is nothing but green to show until the foliage leaves. Knowing its uniqueness, people deliberately visit Goseong even on rainy days.
Rather, a watercolor
You must go through the ticket office and the herb shop to enter the lavender field. People who were curiously stepping on each other stopped at the entrance and made a short elastic. The landscape in the snow without notice is quite surprising.
Scenery that must be left as a photo
After seeing the appearance, he decided to try a different reaction, but eventually failed. The exclamation of "Wow" comes to the temple even in the landscape facing you.
There is no reason to walk fast
If the main character is a lavender field that looks like a purple carpet, rye and poppy flowers in a colony are excellent supporting roles that shine lavender. Buildings with traces of the paintbrush left on the outer wall are also the best backgrounds for this flower garden. The mist that came down to the mountain is nicer today. It is like a stage device that maximizes the dreamy feeling of purple. Anyway, it all goes perfectly. I've never been there, but it's like any country in Europe I've always dreamed of. A smile never leaves the strange feeling.
Rye field completely different from lavender
Walking around the corner of Honey Lab Farm
Let's go on a full-fledged lavender farm tour with an umbrella. Looking at the entrance, there is a lavender field on the front and right and a rye field on the left. The promenade is divided into two branches, left and right. The starting point on the milestone is the left side. Eventually, it is a course that returns to the origin and returns to the origin. However, there is a farmer's idea of drawing such a great picture on the canvas of the field, so I decided to follow it.
Bicycle wheels reminiscent of lavender and poppy
The size of the rye field is not large. Even the expectation of rotten and tender rye can be a little disappointing. At this time, the rye has been overgrown, so it looks like a rice that is ripe in yellowness. Still, it has its own qualities, so it's good to walk along a path. After passing through the rye field, you will be greeted by a poppy colony located outside as if escorting lavender. Each one seems to show off its splendor with a bunch of water on it.
A blooming poppy flower

On the other side of the entrance, Metasequoia stands like a folding screen. There are several tables and chairs between the trees, so it's good to take a break. Someone might think of words like 'unexpected' or 'accidental' while looking at metasequoia. However, it should be noted that this is also a landscape thoroughly calculated by the farmer. When the site was purchased, the landscaping farm, which was the owner of the original land, was given extra money to buy metasequoia. From the beginning, there was an idea to paint like this. Chestnut flowers are in full bloom outside Metasequoia Road. 'Isn't this too?' Think for a moment.

Metasequoia Road
Now it is time to observe lavender in earnest. Looking at the petals up close, the first impression is modest. Metasequoia and Poppy are very different from the ones that showed their greatness alone. It is much shorter than I thought. It's barely covering the knee.
The scenery is diverse, so it's fun to take pictures
However, the story is different in the vastly spread lavender community. The fragrance becomes darker and the color becomes more vivid. It's even more so if it rains like today. It is fluttering in the wind and creates a purple sea.
A leisurely stroll between mother chickens and chicks
It is not only people who cross this sea. Chickens and chicks raised on farms find food and take a stroll here. Even bees, which are hard to see in the city, have no time to collect pollen. If you listen with your eyes closed, you can clearly hear the happy singing of the bees.
Lavender tractor
It takes about an hour to slowly walk around the Honey Lavender Farm. On weekends where there is a lot of experience, it can be longer.
When the sky is more cloudy than the blue sky, my color is clearly displayed.
Efforts in the fragrance of lavender
Until Hanni Lavender Farm became a wonderful farm as it is now, there was a bloody sweat of Ha Deok-ho. Lavender was the weapon of choice for selling different herbal teas online. I traveled abroad and looked for scenes that could be modeled. As a result, the honey lavender lavender farm was created by partially referring to the lavender fields in Hokkaido. In 2002, even the word landscape farming was unfamiliar.
Herb Shop Products
Goseong, Gangwon-do, which was warm in winter and cool in summer, was selected as the best place for lavender farm. There was no place like this to grow lavender, which had poor cold resistance. A variety of plants such as lavender, rye, poppy, and white pink celix were planted by purchasing suitable sites. At first it was difficult of course. Few customers visited the Goseong Valley, but the investment continued to be unknown. Eventually, some of the purchased land was sold to increase lavender. It's a small private farm, but it's a steady festival.
Lavender scent bag that became the best seller
This effort began to pay off in 10 years. Tourists are increasing every year, photographers from all over the country gather, and love calls from broadcasters and filmmakers follow. Work is still going on, but old fatigue flies away when you see the admirers of lavender.
Backyard with Sihwajeon open

'Honey Farm Lavender Festival' celebrated 12 times this year. At the festival, various experience programs using lavender, such as making lavender sachets, making aroma sprays, and making lavender pizzas, are operated. In addition, events such as drawing contests, scent concerts, and photo contests are also held.

Ha is planning to develop this place into an art farm in the future and use it as a local channel to promote the works of difficult artists.

Works produced by the Goseong Youth Literature Society are on display

I had a pretty scent in my eyes and couldn't forget it ~ ♪

The identity of 'You who approached lightly' appearing in 'Purple Scent' seems to be dim now. Perhaps he had a dreamy and subtle charm. It would have been better to shine than to shine yourself. If it met on a rainy day or at the dawn of the water mist, it would have shown a different face than usual. And at one time it was someone's tears. Like lavender.

Tree hanging over snowy lavender farm winter landscape
Travel info

Honey Lavender Farm

-Address: 175 Flower Daemaeul-gil, Ganseong-eup, Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do

-Inquiries: 033-681-0005

https://korean.visitkorea.or.kr/detail/ms_detail.do?cotid=7f215512-d70e-4616-96c2-57b6c2d7789f


Honey Lavender Farm Lavender Festival 2019

-Period: 2019.06.01 ~ 06.23

https://korean.visitkorea.or.kr/detail/fes_detail.do?cotid=cd428cb1-705f-4e5e-a034-88cfa35ff1d1


Restaurants near

-Jangsaemi Makguksu: Makguksu, Maeungdeunggalbi / 13 Jangsaemigil, Toseong-myeon, Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do / 033-633-8056

-Couple Sashimi: Live fish sashimi, water sashimi / 88, Whaena Beach-gil, Jukwang-myeon, Goseong-gun, Gangwon-gun / 033-681-0094

-Seongjin Hall: Ecological stew / 99 Geotanjin-ro, Geojin-eup, Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do / 033-682-1040

http://cafe.daum.net/JSGOSD

-VIP Motel: 28, Geotanjin-ro 72beon-gil, Geojin-eup, Goseong-gun, Gangwon-do / 033-682-6363

item.title: Happy time, even on the riverside - Cheorwon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Songdae beef with columnar joint

Happy time, even on the riverside

Cheorwon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

Image 9 degrees. The weather is very late. It's been a while since Dae-eun dies with a cold. Besides, this is Cheolwon, the coldest place in Korea. It's not a pity that I left in anticipation of the frozen river and the white snow that threw down on it. to be. Although not officially named, the name of this road is called 'Hantan River Trail'. We will meet the Hantan River a little closer along the road once a year.
Cheorwon-gun hosts the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival every mid-January. This year, the seventh year, the festival is held for nine days from January 19 to 27. It's the only ice trek theme in Korea that walks on frozen rivers.
Travelers trekking along the Hantan River Trail
The fun of walking on the transparent ice like glass is that you can meet the unexplored view of Cheorwon, which Hantan River embraces while walking such as Songdaeso, Jusangjeolli, Seungil Bridge, and Goseokjeong.
Travelers trekking along the Hantan River Trail
The Hantan River Trail runs from the Taebong Bridge, which is the starting point, to the Goseokjeong which is the destination, and most of the sections overlap the ice trekking course. That's because the road was designed to compensate for the lack of ice trekking. In other words, even the coldest weather in Cheorwon is not enough to freeze the entire Hantan River, which is famous for its roughness, so that people can walk on it. Therefore, the Hantan River Trail is designed to make it possible to bypass only high velocity or deep water sections.
Seungil Bridge, a landmark of Cheorwon-gun
Therefore, the Hantan River Trail is a supporting role for the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival. To be honest, it's a star, but it's as good as another walking trail at the Ice Trekking Festival. That's the fun of walking.
Goseokjeong is famous for Cheorwon
The Hantan River Trail begins at Taebong Bridge, just like ice trekking. After walking down a short staircase, you will pass through a small park with rest facilities such as toilets and wooden chairs. Hanging close enough to smell the fresh water, the Hantan River sparkles in jade as if it were against the seasons. Even after descending to the river, the trail is clear. There is no rough surface because it is not the original way, but the sandbags are stacked in the chin to adjust the height, and the signal ribbons indicating the direction of progress are also tightly attached so that you can walk comfortably without getting lost.
The shape of the strange rock formed by the Hantan River
The bridge was installed where the river that flowed without hesitation took a breath. If the river was frozen, I would not have to cross it, but now I can't find the 'ㅇ' of ice. In fact, it was the biggest disappointment of the 6km Hantan River Trail. Why not? The famous Songdae place is a place where you can see the frontal view and bend around with a jujube joint spreading like Buchatsal. Songdaeso's columnar joint towering on the transparent ice floor is one of the representative images of the Hantan River, or Cheorwon's winter. Song Dae-so is deep enough to lack a bundle of yarn, so when ice trekking, do not approach the columnar joint, but only pass the designated course.
On the Hantan River Trail, pedestrian bridges and bridges were installed everywhere.
After the pedestrian bridge, the road mixes with the two courses for a while. Climb the short slopes and pass the refreshing deck road to see the birch forest. It's not luxuriant, but it still feels like a surprise gift. Passing through the smooth shape of the birch forest, you will find the Songdae Observatory. The songdaeso, which was hidden in a tree and scattered like a puzzle piece, is completely united here.
Songdaeso and Jusangjeolli
The path that descends from the observatory to the riverside turns into a mountain path. After you climb the mountain, pay a little attention. If you sell yourself, you can miss the road.
Travelers Through Birch Forest
Missing the way here does not mean getting lost. However, if you miss the yellow ribbon with the words 'Hantan River Ice Trekking', you will follow the middle of the road. That means about 3.5 kilometers, or more than half, along the wrong road, from the bridge that meets the Songdaeso Observatory to the Seungil Bridge where the driving site is located. The road that descends to the riverside is about 100m ahead of the signpost in front of the bridge.
View from Songdae Observatory
After descending to the riverside, the Hantan River is always on the way from Seungil Bridge to Goseokjeong. Like a dandelion dandelion does not leave for a moment.
Yard Rock
The large waterways silently follow the traveler's side when walking past the yard rock, which was once famous as a nude location among photographers, as well as walking on the sand that falls to the ankle. Sometimes rough and sometimes calm. Travelers don't have to be bored with the changing rivers.
Ragged Rock Segment
In the resting areas around the riverside streets such as Songdaeso, Madang Rock, and Naedaeyangjang, there will be exciting busking performances that will inspire the participants during the festival.
Seungil and Hantan Bridge
When we arrive at Seungil Bridge, the Hantan River Trail is now in its final stage. It is about 1km from Seungil Bridge to Goseokjeong. Even if you walk slowly, you can reach it in about 30 minutes. This year, the course extends from Goseokjeong to Sundam Valley, completing a trek of 7.5km.
The section connecting Goseokjeong from Seungil Bridge
The sand dunes under the Seungil Bridge will be used as driving areas for the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival.
The last tusks leading to Goseokjeong
Various performances such as fusion gugak and b-boys will be prepared on the main stage, as well as ice sculptures that symbolize Cheorwon such as Gungye King and Labor Party.
Old stone from the bridge
There are also exciting winter events such as dog sledding, a hot air balloon experience, a kite flying experience, and a sledding range.
Travelers looking at the Hantan River from Goseokjeong
Cheolwon-gun plans to operate two shuttle buses from Goseokjeong to Seongil-gyo to Taebong Bridge during the Ice Trekking Festival.
Goseokjeong is the destination of the Hantan River Trail and Ice Trekking
The Hantan River Trail and Ice Trekking Course will be open until the end of February after the festival.
A huge icicle ran on a rocky cliff
Travel info

Cheorwon Hantan River Ice Trekking
-Place: Cheolwon Hantan River Taebong Bridge ~ Sundam Valley
-Date: 2019.01.19 ~ 2019.01.27
Inquiries: 033-450-5255 (Cheolwon County Office, Tourism and Culture Division)

https://korean.visitkorea.or.kr/


Restaurants near
-Muntong Line Hanwoochon: Sogoguii / 4987 Hoguk-ro, Galmal-eup, Cheorwon-gun, Gangwon, Korea / 033-452-6649
-Imkeokjeong Garden: Maeuntang, Sanchae Bibimbap / 1825, Taebong-ro, Dongsong-eup / 033-455-8779
-Waterfall Garden: Maeuntang / 86, Jiktang-gil, Dongsong-eup / 033-455-3546


Rooms
-Fuzhou Mountain Natural Recreation Forest: 818 Haojae-ro, Geunnam-myeon / 033-458-9426
-Sun Leisure Tel: 1831-1, Taebong-ro, Dongsong-eup / 033-456-2120

http://www.썬레저텔.com/

-W Motel: 114-1, Seong-ro, Galmal-eup / 033-452-5487

http://cwmotel.modoo.at/

item.title: Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival - Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Mountain Trout Ice Fishing Boat Scenery

Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

There are two ways to enjoy winter. One is to find a warm indoor fun to avoid the cold, and the other is to experience the best of winter with the whole body. The latter example is Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival. At Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival, ice fishing, ice sledding, ice football, ice bicycle, skating, and other winter games were gathered. All the fun in winter can be enjoyed. Even if it is not explained with the title of “World Four Winter Festival” and “7 Wonders of World Winter,” it has become a representative winter festival in Korea. The reason why more than 1 million people visit the Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival each year is 'being fun and fun'.

Enjoy Mountain Trout Festival and Flowers of Mountain Trout Festival!
The beauty of Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival is the fishing of perch. Many people have been waiting for a year because they have not forgotten this taste. Are you worried about the cold? Don't be afraid. I'm rumored to be cold, and I've been looking for Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival for 4 years. The time I wait for an errant mackerel on an ice sheet to ask for my fishing rod is as exciting as waiting for a lover in my love life. The lover may soon appear, or may not appear forever that day. But waiting time is expected to inflate. If you hear the sound of 'caught' here and there, you may be in a hurry.
Hundreds of emotions pass through ice fishing. Then, the trembling trembling through the fishing rod, and the joy of picking up wild trout seems to be lacking compared to winning the lottery. There is no room for the interruption of the cold and the time of expectation and pleasure repeated. The minds of those who lie down on the ice floor and look at only small ice holes are understood only by those who have ever tried fishing.
A child who likes to catch wild trout
Parents with small children are more inclined to expect children's expectations, 'When will my mom and dad catch mountain trout?' But where is fishing going? If your children are waiting, but you can't fish mountain trout, use the infant ice fishing. The infant's special ice fishing beneath the bridge is only available for preschoolers. One guardian is allowed per child. The volunteer also explains how to fish for the child. It operates for one hour once and can catch up to one bird per person. There are few anglers and there are a lot of mountain trout, so most of them are raised one by one. A young child may catch a wild trout caught by mom and dad. Infant ice fishing runs twice a day from Friday to Sunday. The fee is free.
Infant fishing spot for preschoolers
If you can't help yourself, try more aggressively. The most obvious way to put a wild trout in my hand in a short time is to experience the hand-held trout. Wear shorts in short sleeves and jump directly into the cold water where mountain trout plays. You can get wild trout at once without waiting as boring as fishing. Instead, good luck can only be obtained by those who have the courage to cope with the cold. There is also a children's corner.
Challenge of courageous people, Sancheon bare hands
Surprisingly, many people participate to create a true scenery. Those who dive into the cold water, and those who watch it, have a lot of fun.
Children's Mountain Trout Bare Hands Experience Center
If you caught a wild fish, it's time to taste the wild fish. There is a pottery and meeting center near the fishing grounds. You can eat wild trout in a large grill and eat it freshly. It's more valuable because it's a dish of ham that I caught. The cost of grilling wild trout or sashimi is 2,000 won per fish. Even if you haven't caught the wild trout, you can try the wild trout at the various food venues around the festival. San-cheoneo sashimi, Sancheon-ebi bibimbap, and grilled fish from the San-eup Festival. Sancheon Fish Restaurant, located upstream of Baumori Bridge, offers a variety of dishes using Sancheoneo Udon, Sancheoneo Gas, and Sancheoneo Fish Cake. You can also find snacks such as mountain trout shaped breads and sausages with wild trout.
Hot Sancheon Bread
'If you want to taste more special mountain trout dishes, go to Daecheong Maru', a restaurant located in Hwacheon-eup. There is a unique menu called Mountain Trout Boiled Stone Rice. There are plenty of wild salmon in hot stone rice. I'm worried about the fish, but if you try it, it doesn't taste fishy at all. This is one of the specialties that can be tasted only during the Mountain Trout Festival.
Recreational Stone Pot with Wild Trout
From Sancheon fish coffee museum to astronomical projection room, there are many new experiences
The Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival is another advantage of fishing and fishing. In the heart of the festival, Earl Bear Castle enjoys ice sculptures, ice tunnels and ice slides.
Sledding on the Tube
In the future, there is a large ice sledding range. From wooden single-man sledges to multi-seater family ice sleds and bikes on ice, you can experience a wide range of experiences.
Slippery Football on Ice
There's also plenty to see and do, including sledding on a tube, bobsled down a long tub-shaped track, ice football, curling and ice hockey on an ice sheet.
Bike ride on ice
This doesn't just mean ice-related play. Last year, he ran the astronomical projection room from the Landscaping Astronomical Observatory, which opened in Hwacheon. They also see constellations in space made of air domes and observe sunspots through astronomical telescopes. There is also a wooden experience center where you can play with the tree.
Enjoy astronomical experience at the Mountain Trout Festival
Don't miss the fun outside the festival. If you go to Multipurpose Plaza in Hwacheon-eup, Sancheon Fish Coffee Museum, Indoor Ice Sculpture Square, and Sancheon Fish Cinema are well located.
Sancheoneo Coffee Museum opened in December
The Sancheon Fish Coffee Museum opened in December last year. Various collections of coffee are on display. There is also a cafe space on one side for tasting. It is good to take a break to cool down.
Sancheoneo Coffee Museum opened in December
The way to the indoor ice sculpture square is like entering a frozen warehouse. The Frozen Kingdom is full of ice. Various pieces of ice are on display including turtle ship, statue of Admiral Yi Sun-sin, Sungnyemun Gate, Taj Mahal, Vatican Cathedral and Venus. The sculptures are made by sculptors of the ice lantern festival in Harbin, China.
Korea's largest indoor ice sculpture square
The Coffee Museum and the Ice Sculpture Square are adjacent to the leading street and are open until 9 pm during the Mountain Trout Festival.
Another highlight of the Mountain Trout Festival,
Travel info

Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Address: 137, Sancheoneo-gil, Hwacheon-eup, Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do

Contact: 1688-3005

http://www.narafestival.com/01_icenara/


Restaurants near

Daecheong Maru: Dolsotbap, Mountain Trout Boyangdolsotbap / 8, Jungang-ro 5-gil, Hwacheon-eup, Hwacheon-gun / 033-442-1290

Old bone restaurant: Oedo-ri-tang, Dongtae-jigae / 13-3, Jungang-ro 4-gil, Hwacheon-eup, Hwacheon-gun / 033-441-5565
Fish Meat: Hanwoo Bulgogi / 23, Jungang-ro 7-gil, Hwacheon-eup, Hwacheon-gun / 033-441-9252

Rooms

Paro Hanok Pension: 167 Pyeonghwa-ro, Hwacheon-eup, Hwacheon-gun / 033-441-1488

http://www.paroho.kr/

Aquatic Resort: 578 Woncheon-ri, Hanam-myeon, Hwacheon-gun / 033-441-3880

http://www.aquaticresort.com/

Hwacheon Wood Experience Center Housing Hall: 5289-11, Yeongseo-ro, Hanam-myeon, Hwacheon-gun / 033-441-9928

item.title: “Fishing is not everything ~” Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival - Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Tourists Enjoying Wild Trout Fishing

“Fishing is not everything ~” Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

The Hwacheon Sancheon Fish Festival, which has been selected as the representative festival of the Republic of Korea for four consecutive years, announced its opening on the 14th. Thanks to the powerful cold weather that had been visited two or three days ago, Hwacheoncheon was not frozen. More than 200,000 tourists went to the first weekend. They faced the wind and heated up fishing for trout. The best part of the Mountain Trout Festival is silk fishing. From zip wires to ice sleds, you won't have 24 hours a day to chill out. Let's go to the winter kingdom Hwacheon to fully enjoy this winter.
Hwacheon's natural festival
Hwacheon is a beautiful country rich in mountain resources. Surrounded by Ilsan, Byeongpungsan, Maebongsan and Duryu, the Bukhangang River flows southwest of the county. In particular, Lake Paro is famous for its superb view of the lush trees that surround it. However, it did not receive much attention as a tourist destination due to the surrounding cities such as Chuncheon and Pocheon. One of the reasons was the relatively low accessibility due to the twisted national road and the limited development of tourism resources due to the military area.
In this situation, villagers developed a winter festival that reversed the closed environment. The main program is to catch mountain trout, a first-class cold water native fish, on the ice. Hwacheon's average winter temperature of minus 7 degrees made the burdensome content of ice fishing possible. The festival, which was first launched in 2003, was selected as the 'Festival Festival' selected by the Ministry of Education in 2006, followed by the 'Excellent Festival' and 'Best Festival'. Now its reputation and recognition are comparable to the world's three major winter festivals, such as the Sapporo Snow Festival, Harbin Ice Festival and the Canadian Winter Carnival.
Mountain trouts of various sizes caught in the hands of a Kang Tae Gong
This year's Mountain Trout Festival will be held for 23 days from January 14 to February 5. In order to prevent tourists from escaping at low tide in the evening, the city has greatly enhanced the benefits such as expanding night ice fishing and free admission to night fishing when using accommodations in Hwacheon-gun. Hwacheon's strategy of attempting to transform into a stay-type festival without compromising on the exceptional record of mobilizing more than 1 million tourists for 10 consecutive years is already ahead of expectations.
Busy Hands to Supply Wild Trout
Ice fishing in the morning and ice experience in the afternoon
The early-bird spirit is needed to enjoy the Mountain Trout Festival more effectively. The festival is so large and crowded that the series of experiences leading to entry, fishing, dining, and night events is not memorable.
"Where are you?" Sharp eyes focusing on the fishing rod
Usually, people line up like dawn to get a ticket. The time required for grilling and circuit-cooking the caught mackerel is at least 30 minutes, so it is important to be prepared to start fishing at 9:00 am, the opening time. If you settle well, you can achieve '3 per person,' which is allowed during the morning. If you ever get out of the fishing field empty hands do not need to be too sad. There are many restaurants selling wild trouts throughout the festival. If you meet your talented neighbor Kang Tae-gong and get a free fish, you can get a free prize.
Mountain trout caught at the end of trouble
The taste of wild trout sashimi is very sweet. It is cloudy and dark in color compared to the red-colored trout, but lacks the earthy or fishy taste of freshwater fish. It's even slightly oily like saltwater fish. Moderate salted grilled sea trout also grabs the taste of both ages.
Floating mackerel sashimi
It is a big fish with a length of 2 ~ 30cm and its flesh is thick. The lack of taste attracts tourists to Hwacheon every winter.
Hearty mountain trout
From late afternoon after fishing and eating, you can enjoy ice skating at the Ice Sled Square and the event booth. You can experience ice sledding, figure skating, snow sledding, bobsleigh and other items at a low price of about 5,000 won.
Straw wire that crosses the sky
There is also a wide range of winter culture villages where you can experience skiing across rivers, make sweets, make traditional games, and burn wishes with straw wire.
Adults enjoy thrilling sledding
If you have time, you can drop by at Santa Post Office and send a message directly to Santa. The pure eyes of the children expecting Santa's reply color the white hearts of the passing adults.
Hey ~!
More fun place at night
Hwacheon night is more beautiful than day. A bright red with thousands of bulbs is a sign that another world is open.
Hwacheon live in street lamps
On the first street, there are big and small events such as free beer tasting, pierrot ballooning, celebrations, and spinning wheels.
Twinkling
A glass of free beer reflects the spirit of Hwacheon residents who overcome the winter with an unconventional spirit.
Tourists bringing in a tasting beer
You can feel the romance of winter night even in indoor ice sculpture square. Created by the ice sculpture experts of Harbin Ice Festival, this space is colorfully decorated with landmarks from around the world. There are many cute photo zones, and lovers and young children are particularly happy. The indoor ice sculpture plaza is located a little away from the riverside, but if you take a slow walk through the food plaza and the leading street, you can arrive in about 15 minutes. In front of the indoor ice sculpture plaza, there is also an event where the Cho Kyung Chul Observatory installs an astronomical telescope and allows tourists to observe the moon and the planet.
Little boy coming down the ice sculpture slide
If you enjoy playing, seeing and eating, the day feels very short. If you want to experience the best of the festival and Hwacheon's specialty, we recommend you to visit for a night instead of the day. Staying at Hwacheon will give you the benefits of free night fishing, so be sure to stay motivated. In addition to the entrance fee, there will be various additional costs, but most of them are cheap and a certain amount can be returned to Hwacheon Love Gift Certificate. Hwacheon Love Gift Certificates can be used like cash at farms and specialty stores located throughout the festival. Popular items include tomato laver, tomato juice, and homemade jam. Hwacheon also hosts a tomato festival every August using its specialty tomato, so if you feel sorry to leave this small country village, let's pledge this summer.
Colorful fireworks show for the opening of the Mountain Trout Festival
Travel info

Contact: 1688-3005

http://www.narafestival.com/01_icenara/

item.title: Hongcheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea - Trip to keep me in 1.5 pyeong, prison in me
item.description:
'Prison within me' located in Hongcheon

Trip to keep me in 1.5 pyeong, prison in me

Hongcheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

8 o'clock in the evening. Lock with a 3rd visit outside. The only way to connect to the outside is to serve as a food court. It is time with myself from the moment. When you're running too hard and you don't want to move too tired, let's leave everything and pause. 1.5 pyeong small space in the prison inside of me.
Face with me
The battery is charged when it runs out, and the burned candle is replaced by a new one when worn out. How can a dead person regain energy? Fallen power can be replenished with meals and exercise, but mental exhaustion is not the way to find it. However, if you are in a prison in me, located in Hongcheon, Gangwon-do, you may be able to lift a limp soul.
Prison training in me that looks over the pampas grass
The prison in me is a reflection program that looks back on you. Through Prison Stay, staying in a solitary period for a period of time, Father Hwang Ji-yeon's' Prison within Me 'who breaks habitual daily life through anneagram and meditation,' Kim Kang's' Uncertainty 'who look inside, and plays himself There are various programs, such as Hei Ji-hyang's "Pleasant Prison".
A picture of the history of the Happy Factory, which runs the 'Prison within me'
The prison head of the prison in me is Kwon Yong-suk, a lawyer from the prosecutor's office. The period behind the creation of a 'prison' that anyone is reluctant to go back to the late 1990s. During the prosecutor's case at Jeju Prosecutor, he worked nearly 100 hours a week, and he needed to recharge both his body and mind. It was prison that caught his eye at that time. His request to spend a week in prison for the prison warden was now the seed of 'the prison within me'.
Jail in me where you can find good writing here and there
The Hongcheon Training Center, where 'the prison within me' is located, consists of three buildings: the training center, the Gangdang-dong, and the administrative building.
Prison training in me
Suyeon-dong, a reflection space for residents, is used as a solitary classroom and 32 cozy rooms on 2nd and 3rd floors. Group activities such as recreation and meals take place in the auditorium building, and managers stay in the management building.
The entrance to Suyeon-dong's iron gate is blue with snow.
The special feature of the program is that the participant is kept in solitary like a real prisoner. Toiletries and writing instruments are all you can carry. Not only mobile phones but books are also allowed. A small table and a single futon occupy me inside of a room that is full.
Inside view of the training center
1.5 pyeong is wider than 15 pyeong
The winter in Gangwon-do is more peaceful than I thought. Instead of rippling streams, you'll be able to jump on ice and, if you're lucky, you'll find elk that's been running through the mountains. However, the concentric filling begins for a while in a small 1.5-pyeong room with a blue jumpsuit and a number instead of a name, with a pit under the door.
The space where you meet me, 1.5 pyeong solitary
The room is large enough for five steps for a man and six steps for a woman. In a room that doesn't even fit a single bed, there's a small drawer and desk, a single teapot and an electric pot, and a toilet and a small sink. It may be frustrating, but if you go through it, space is left. Things that seemed inconvenient because of it are rather cumbersome.
Feeling warm happiness in a cup of tea during the morning sun
When you enter the room after the group schedule, the visit will be locked outside with 3 kinds and you will start your own time. Before going into a solitary confinement, let's leave the worldly thing as possible for full concentration. The anxiety that arises from the loss of the concept of time is brief. Only the sound of the bells, the bells ringing in time, the rice coming in through the pot, and the relaxed nature of the sun rises and falls.
The appearance of the monk Keumkang
The first time he spends in the silence is 'But'. The surroundings are quiet, but the head is eaten with the sounds of various thoughts. I want to run out of the world wondering about it. But at some point I find myself immersed in myself instead of regretting the outside.
When it's time for meals, you'll get meals through the visiting pit.
The programs that make the most use of training centers are short-term programs for homeless people and non-communities. A non-communist means a monk, who is a monk and a monk who concentrates on the topic for several years in a solitary cell. It starts at 108 times every day for seven nights and eight days, and during the morning, he frees his head while listening to the Kumgang monk's broadcast lecture, which releases the public commentary `` Munjikan ''. In the afternoon, only beginners will be interviewed with beginner lectures. If you are not willing to attend, you can immerse yourself in a 1.5-pyeong single room for seven nights and eight days. Your day will be an unfamiliar experience that no one disturbs.
If you visit in the winter, you can stroll on a frozen river.
There is a moment where you stop and wander in front of you. In that case, let's get out of the world and lock yourself in solitary confinement. It's time to listen to what you want, not the world, to give you a richer inner life than you think.
Participants enjoy the nature lying on the ice
Travel info

Prison
